folder.name: setup for  dedicated sql pool for test  bank data

content.query:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- B.  CREATE FINAL (typed) TABLES (HEAP distribution chosen)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE BankCredit.dim_customers (
    customer_id VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender CHAR(1),
    income DECIMAL(10,2),
    employment_status VARCHAR(50),
    years_employed INT,
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(50),
    created_date DATETIME NULL
)
WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, HEAP);
GO
PRINT 'dim_customers created';

CREATE TABLE BankCredit.fact_loans (
    loan_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    customer_id VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    loan_amount DECIMAL(12,2),
    loan_purpose VARCHAR(50),
    loan_term_months INT,
    interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
    issue_date DATE,
    loan_status VARCHAR(50),
    created_date DATETIME NULL
)
WITH (DISTRIBUTION = HASH(customer_id), HEAP);
GO
PRINT 'fact_loans created';

CREATE TABLE BankCredit.dim_credit_history (
    customer_id VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    credit_score INT,
    num_credit_accounts INT,
    total_credit_limit DECIMAL(12,2),
    credit_utilization DECIMAL(5,2),
    num_late_payments INT,
    bankruptcies INT,
    created_date DATETIME NULL
)
WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, HEAP);
GO
PRINT 'dim_credit_history created';
GO
